description:
As a user 
    I want to have an Inventory Service
    So that I can manage items

steps.name: I send a POST request to "/items" with invalid data:
the response status should be 400

cells: Quantity must be greater than or equal to 0
Price must be greater than or equal to 0

steps.name: the response should contain validation errors:
the response status should be 404
the response should contain error message "Item not found with id: 00000000-0000-0000-0000-000000000000"
the response status should be 404
the response should contain error message "Item not found with id: 11111111-1111-1111-1111-111111111111"
the response status should be 404
the response should contain error message "Item not found with id: 22222222-2222-2222-2222-222222222222"
I send a PUT request to "/items/00000000-0000-0000-0000-000000000000" with invalid data:
the response status should be 400

cells: Quantity must be greater than or equal to 0
Price must be greater than or equal to 0

steps.name: the response should contain validation errors:
I send a PUT request to "/items/00000000-0000-0000-0000-000000000000" with valid data:
the response status should be 404
the response should contain error message "Item not found with id: 00000000-0000-0000-0000-000000000000"
I send a PUT request to "/items/11111111-1111-1111-1111-111111111111" with valid data:
the response status should be 404
the response should contain error message "Item not found with id: 11111111-1111-1111-1111-111111111111"
I send a PUT request to "/items/22222222-2222-2222-2222-222222222222" with valid data:
the response status should be 404
the response should contain error message "Item not found with id: 22222222-2222-2222-2222-222222222222"
the response status should be 404
the response should contain error message "Item not found with id: 00000000-0000-0000-0000-000000000000"
the response status should be 404
the response should contain error message "Item not found with id: 11111111-1111-1111-1111-111111111111"
the response status should be 404
the response should contain error message "Item not found with id: 22222222-2222-2222-2222-222222222222"
I send a POST request to "/items" with valid data:
the response status should be 201
the response should contain item details:
I have created an item with data:
I send a GET request to "/items"
the response status should be 200
the response should contain items:
I have created an item with data:
I send a GET request to "/items/{id}" with the created item id
the response status should be 200
the response should contain item details:
I have created an item with data:
I send a PUT request to "/items/{id}" with valid data:
the response status should be 200
the response should contain item details:
I have created an item with data:
I send a DELETE request to "/items/{id}" with the created item id
the response status should be 204

name: Inventory Service Item API Endpoints Validation
